stories.text: One thing that I always wondered about the many companies moving to microservices is how they keep track of all the services that are created and how they all relate. Is it a manual process or automated in some way? Or is it a "probably accurate" diagram that gets up dated when remembered about?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you document your microservices?

stories.text:
I am looking for interesting "book recommendations" particularly.

Someone told me that they were afraid to share their vulnerabilities with me because they feared I might not be comforting or even give them more anxiety.

I have looked up to HN for wisdom over the years and hopefully this ask piques enough interest.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do I develop skills to comfort people and offer compassion?
The Dignity of the Body: Why Medical Rights Are Fundamental Now More Than Ever
